sentences.en: A scientific definition should point out its nature and reflect its epochal characteristics.
sentences.cn: 科学的城市定义应反映出城市的本质和时代特征.

sentences.en: All of this will make Mr. Obama's trip less epochal.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切都将使奥巴马之行难以达到划时代的高度.

sentences.en: Any system able to do that would be a truly epochal achievement, but such a miracle is not on the agenda of even the most advanced machine translation developers.
sentences.cn: 如果有翻译系统能翻译出这些因素，这将是划时代的成就；要知道，即使现在最先进的机器翻译研发机构也不敢将此作为研究目标。

sentences.en: Columbus action might be divided into epochal action and individual action.
sentences.cn: 哥伦布的行为可以解析为时代行为和个人行为.

sentences.en: Economic globalization and regional regularization are the epochal characteristics in the world of today.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化和区域集团化是当今世界经济的时代特征.

sentences.en: Editorial: World Mutation or Epochal Challenge?
sentences.cn: 社论: 世界突变抑或时代挑战?

sentences.en: Epochal angels: direction of the affaires of each generation and root race.
sentences.cn: 年代天使: 指引每个年代的事务及其根源.

sentences.en: Even this epochal discovery was not sufficient.
sentences.cn: 甚至这个划时代的发现也不是充分的.

sentences.en: Marxism has 5 bright basic features: epochal, innovative, systematical , practical and people's.
sentences.cn: 马克思主义具有五个鲜明的基本特征: 一是时代性; 二是创新性;三是系统性; 四是实践性; 五是人民性.

sentences.en: That calculation is not worthy of our ideals and represents an error of epochal proportions.
sentences.cn: 但这种算计是不能以我们的理想为代价的,而且这种算计反映的是对时代大势的错误判断.

sentences.en: That sounds soft and mushy and commonplace, but in fact it can legitimately be called epochal.
sentences.cn: 这听起来轻松平常, 实际上却完全可以称作划时代的.

sentences.en: The construction of lighting culture cause, which has national, regional and epochal characteristics, is an absolutely necessary basis, and promotion for the development of modern society.
sentences.cn: 建设具有民族、地域和时代特色的光文化事业，是现代社会发展不可缺少的基础和推动。

sentences.en: The theme has the epochal character and the class character, the connotation sometimes has not.
sentences.cn: 主题具有时代性、阶级性, 意蕴具有超时代性、超阶级性.

sentences.en: Theresa May has set out a new role for a "global Britain" outside Europe's single market in a landmark 1 speech outlining plans for the UK's epochal EU exit.
sentences.cn: 特里萨·梅（Theresa May）为一个置身于欧洲单一市场以外的“全球的英国”设定了新的角色，她在里程碑式的演讲中概述了英国划时代退欧的计划。

sentences.en: This led to the next epochal shift.
sentences.cn: 这导致了下一个划时代的转变。

sentences.en: This product is epochal product most recently researched and developed.
sentences.cn: 本机是最新研发划时代的产品.

sentences.en: To see why, consider another epochal shift in the development of a rising economic power.
sentences.cn: 来看看为什么。 考虑到在政府日益增长的经济实力下的另一个划时代的转变。

words.tran_cn: [地质] 世；新纪元；新时代；时间上的一点

trans.tran_cn: 新纪元的，划时代的，有重大意义的
